task.description:
Analyze and document CardFlow system

CRITICAL PATH REMINDERS:
- Primary app is in module-assembler-ui/, NOT root level

KEY FILES:
- Main Server: module-assembler-ui/server.cjs
- Main React: module-assembler-ui/src/App.jsx
- React Entry: module-assembler-ui/src/main.jsx
- Master Agent: module-assembler-ui/lib/agents/master-agent.cjs
- AI Pipeline: module-assembler-ui/lib/services/ai-pipeline.cjs

analysis.summary: CardFlow is a modular ecosystem of card-based UI components and multi-step workflow flows for e-commerce, trading cards, and monetization

cards.CardPrice: frontend/card-components/components/cards/CardPrice.js - Price display with change tracking, history charts, range indicators
cards.CardMarketplace: frontend/card-components/components/cards/CardMarketplace.js - SGC slab marketplace with grid/list views, filtering, 3D flip effects
cards.StatCards: frontend/stat-cards/ - Dashboard metrics display (total cards, market value, priced cards)
cards.SurveyCard: frontend/survey-card/SurveyCard.jsx - Survey opportunity display with payout and category info
cards.FeatureCard: frontend/welcome-screen/FeatureCard.jsx - Onboarding feature highlights with hover effects

flows.CheckoutFlow: frontend/checkout-flow/pages/Checkout.jsx - Multi-step trading card checkout with price negotiation, bundle discounts, payment selection
flows.CashoutFlow: frontend/balance-display/components/wallet/CashoutFlow.jsx - 4-step payout workflow (PayPal, CashApp, Venmo, USDC, Amazon)
flows.AutomationFlows: frontend/business-admin/components/marketing/AutomationFlows.jsx - Marketing automation (welcome series, abandoned cart, post-purchase)

services.cardDatabaseLookup: backend/ai-scanner/services/cardDatabaseLookup.js - Card search, price lookup, market data
